/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall apartment buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the clear blue sky. The buildings are adorned with balconies and windows, adding architectural interest to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the street, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation culture. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
